name: Starlit Archery Club
description:
Become the greatest Archer in Starlit universe!

Play with your favorite characters and enjoy the story-line from the universe introduced in the award-winning game Starlit Adventures!

FEATURES:

* COMPETE in battles with other online players!

* STRATEGY AND PRECISION are your keys to victory!

* UNLEASH POWER-UPS to defeat your opponent!

* OTHERWORLDLY BOSSES to be defeated in special challenges!

* ADVANCE among the ranks to compete in multiple cup tournaments!

* EXPLORE NEW WORLDS, each with their own levels and challenges!

* UNLOCK ACTION FIGURES to complete your collection!

Discover Starlit Archery - and JOIN THE CLUB!
